componentviewer.config.title: Component Viewer Config
componentviewer.config.clipboard.copy.de:
What will be copied to the clipboard on `CTRL + C`.

- Component Value: The value of the currently selected component

- Item Stack: The item stack data

- Give Command: A give command yielding the exact item stack

- Disabled
componentviewer.config.clipboard.formatt:
How copied data will be formatted.

- Sync: The same as for tooltips

- SNBT

- JSON

- Object: Using Java's Object.toString() method. SNBT formatting will still be used for nbt components
componentviewer.config.clipboard.include: Include the count of the item stack in the give command.
componentviewer.config.clipboard.indenta: The amount of spaces used for indentation when formatting. 'No Indentation' will result in a one-liner. 'Sync' copies the indentation behavior of tooltips.
componentviewer.config.clipboard.prepend: Add a `/` in front of the give command.
componentviewer.config.clipboard.success: Receive toast notifications for successful copy actions. You will always receive toast notifications for failed copy actions, regardless of this setting.
componentviewer.config.clipboard.title: Clipboard
componentviewer.config.tooltip.advanced_: The debug option 'Advanced tooltips' must be enabled to display information.
componentviewer.config.tooltip.colored_f: Formatted data (e.g. component values) will be colored.
componentviewer.config.tooltip.component: Component values will be displayed in addition to namespaced component ids.

Which components will be displayed.

- All: Components currently present on the item stack

- Default: Components that default to the item stack

- Changes: Components that have been added, modified or removed
componentviewer.config.tooltip.display.d:
When to display the information of this mod.

- Hold: When holding `CTRL`

- Always

- Never
componentviewer.config.tooltip.formattin:
How displayed data will be formatted.

- SNBT

- JSON

- Object: Using Java's Object.toString() method. SNBT formatting will still be used for nbt components
componentviewer.config.tooltip.indentati: The amount of spaces used for indentation when formatting. 'No Indentation' will result in a one-liner.
componentviewer.config.tooltip.purpose.d:
What's the purpose of tooltips.

- Components: Display individual components of an item stack

- Item Stack: Display the item stack data. This is exactly the same as using `/data get` on the item stack
componentviewer.config.tooltip.title: Tooltips
